sql: SELECT t0.rowid FROM t0 WHERE t0.rowid ORDER BY CASE ((t0.c0) ::BOOL) WHEN 1 THEN t0.rowid END; -- expected: {0, 2}, actual: {140671047175328, 2}
TransferResult: SELECT t0.ctid FROM t0 WHERE t0.c0 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY CASE WHEN (t0.c0)::BOOL THEN t0.ctid END;
MutateResult: SELECT SUM(count) FROM (SELECT (t0.c0 IS NOT NULL)::INTEGER as count FROM t0 ORDER BY CASE WHEN (t0.c0)::BOOL THEN t0.ctid END) as res;
